caption.p: Histopathological findings showing the effects of ten tested materials on carbon tetrachloride-induced liver injury (200 × and 400 × magnification) ( n = 8). A: Control; B: carbon tetrachloride (CCl 4) model; C: Bifendate + CCl 4; D: Coptis chinensis + CCl 4; E: Pueraria lobata root + CCl 4; F: Sanguisorba officinalis + CCl 4. Scale bar, 50 μm in 400×; Box, necrotic area; arrow, inflammatory cell. CCl 4: Carbon tetrachloride.
